    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Ionenanordnungen im Kristallgitter</string>
            <string language="en">Ion configuration in the crystal lattice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Configuration d'ion dans le trellis en cristal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Configuração do íon no lattice de cristal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Configurazione dello ione nella grata di 
cristallo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιονική διαμόρφωση στο δικτυωτό πλέγμα κρυστάλλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Configuración del ion en el cedazo cristalino</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Übersicht der Gittertypen der Salze; Cäsiumchlorid-Gittertyp, Zinksulfid-Gittertyp und Natriumhlorid-Gittertyp.</string>
            <string language="en">Outline of the types of lattice in different salts; cesium-chloride type, zinc-sulfide type and sodium-chloride type.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Salz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Ionengitter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ion lattices</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Contour des types de trellis dans différents sels
; le type de césium-chlorure, le type de zinc-sulfure et le 
sodium-chlorure tapent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esboço dos tipos de lattice em sais diferentes; 
o tipo do césio-cloreto, o tipo do zinco-zinc-sulfide e o 
sodium-cloreto datilografam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Profilo dei tipi di grate in sali differenti; 
il tipo del cesio-cloruro, il tipo del zinco-solfuro ed il 
sodio-cloruro digitano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Περίγραμμα των τύπων δικτυωτών πλεγμάτων στα 
διαφορετικά άλατα  τύπος καίσιο-χλωριδίου, τύπος 
ψευδάργυρος-σουλφιδίου και τύπος νάτριο-χλωριδίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Contorno de los tipos de cedazo en diversas sales;
el tipo del cesio-cloruro, el tipo del cinc-sulfuro y el 
sodio-cloruro pulsan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trellis d'ion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lattices do íon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grate dello ione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιονικά δικτυωτά πλέγματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cedazos del ion</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
